Title: Changes the date of the public hearing to discuss the contents of the proposed budget of fire, fire alarm, and fire protection districts
Summary: Authorizes the date of the public hearing to discuss the contents of the proposed budget of fire, fire alarm, and fire protection districts to be held during the third week of October.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to the date of the public hearing to discuss the contents of the proposed budget of fire, fire alarm, and fire protection districts
